alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:04PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...High Water Continuing This Week Between The Colville and Sag Rivers... The Sag and Kuparuk Rivers have fallen below bankfull and flood advisories for those locations have now been cancelled. Another inch of rain falling over the North Slope Tuesday night Wednesday between the Colville and Sag Rivers will cause most streams and small rivers between the Colville and Sag Rivers to rise to near bankfull Wednesday evening and into Thursday morning. Areas with ponded water will likely expand Wednesday night. Larger rivers such as the Colville, Kuparuk and Sag will rise back to near bankfull Thursday and Friday. No river flooding is expected, but people along rivers in this area should be alert to rising water levels.

area.areaDesc: Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range
